sys_ux_client_script.name: Screen status change handler

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_b232625c6e2202104a4f50c687a6f0b8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">7232625c102202108a73a9321dc321d1</macroponent><name>Screen status change handler</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        title,
        tooltipPreview,
        primaryItem,
        secondaryItems,
        hasUpdate,
        isDirty,
        status,
        screenParams
    } = event.payload;

    helpers.screen.updateStatus({
        title,
        tooltipPreview,
        primaryItem,
        secondaryItems,
        hasUpdate,
        isDirty,
        status,
        screenParams: {
            table: screenParams && screenParams.table,
            sysId: screenParams && screenParams.sys_id
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>b232625c6e2202104a4f50c687a6f0b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Screen status change handler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b232625c6e2202104a4f50c687a6f0b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:23</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
